column1: Table 4-110:  Transmission Mile Coverage (Percent) and Regression Coefficients (kg per mile)
Percentage of Miles Covered by Reporters

a Regression coefficient for emissions is calculated utilizing transmission miles as the explanatory variable and emissions as the response variable. The equation utilizes a constant intercept of zero. When calculating the regression coefficient, outliers are also removed from the analysis when the standard residual for that reporter exceeds the value 3.0.
